text: Svetozar Marović (; born 31 March 1955) is a Montenegrin lawyer and politician. He was the President of Serbia and Montenegro from 2003 until Montenegro declared its independence in 2006. He was the last head of state of Serbia-Montenegro. On December 15, 2015, he was arrested in Montenegro for charges of corruption, and on August 18, 2017, his family's assets were frozen. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Serbia and Montenegro
title: Svetozar Marović
